display.title: Current Study Requirements - Eclectic Collector
display.description: Your magical studies have led you to bring in samples of materials from various exotic locales, dangerous dungeons, and other dimensions. These fascinating finds have unique magical properties that you hope to be able to unlock new secrets from. You require 100 bookshelves, 5 enchanting tables, 20 brewing stands, 10 lecterns, 100 blocks of amethyst, 30 glowstone, 30 quartz, 50 lapis blocks, 20 end stone, 20 purpur, 3 end crystals, 10 crimson wood blocks, 10 warped wood blocks, 20 soul sand, 5 soul fires (or torches, lanterns, or campfires), 20 gold blocks, 20 obsidian, 5 sculk sensors, a sculk shrieker, 20 sculk, 3 sculk catalysts
